articles.author: Arijit Sarkar
articles.title: Sony eyes NFT transfers across multiple game platforms, reveals patent - Cointelegraph
articles.description: As of December 2022, the total number of active users on the PlayStation Network worldwide was 112 million, which continues to grow year-on-year.
articles.content: Sony Interactive Entertainment, the video game goliath running the PlayStation brand, filed a patent for a framework allowing users to transfer and utilize nonfungible tokens (NFTs) across multiple g… [+2102 chars]
